description.english: Kill every character that can be killed.

description.french: Tuer toutes les personnes qui peuvent être tuées.

description.english: Cause a crash while searching the agency database.
description.german: Verursache einen Absturz bei der Suche in der Agenturdatenbank.
description.french: Provoquer un crash en effectuant des recherches dans la base de données de l'agence.
description.italian: Manda in tilt il database dell'agenzia tra una ricerca e l'altra.
description.koreana: 정보기관의 데이터베이스를 검색하다가 고장을 일으키십시오.
description.spanish: Haz que colapse el servidor mientras búscas en la base de datos de la agencia

description.russian: "Положите" сервер во время поиска в базе данных агентства.

description.indonesian: Sebabkan crash saat mencari database agen.

description.english: Leave absolutely zero trace of Cillian Walsh.
description.german: Hinterlasse keine Spur von Cillian Walsh.
description.french: Ne laisser aucune trace de Cillian Walsh.
description.italian: Cancella in tutto e per tutto ogni traccia di Cillian Walsh.
description.koreana: 킬리언 월쉬의 흔적을 완전히 남기지 마십시오.
description.spanish: No dejes ni un sólo rastro de Cillian Walsh.
description.schinese: 完全抹除基利安·沃尔什的痕迹。
description.russian: Полностью сотрите Киллиана Уолша с лица земли.
description.japanese: シリアン・ウォルシュの存在の痕跡を完全に消し去る。
description.brazilian: Não deixe nem sequer um rastro de Cillian Walsh.
description.latam: No dejes ni un sólo rastro de Cillian Walsh.
description.indonesian: Tinggalkan nol jejak Cillian Walsh.

displayName.german: Hör auf, er ist schon tot

description.english: Don't take any chances with a crucial target.

description.italian: Va' sul sicuro con un bersaglio cruciale.
description.koreana: 중요 목표물에게 기회를 절대 주지 마십시오.

description.english: Call a helpline to wrap your head around this cryptocurrency thing.

description.latam: Llama a la línea de ayuda para ponerte en tema con las criptomonedas.
